verses.name: Jeremiah 4:24
verses.text: I beheld the mountains, and, lo, they trembled, and all the hills moved lightly.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:25
verses.text: I beheld, and, lo, there was no man, and all the birds of the heavens were fled.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:26
verses.text: I beheld, and, lo, the fruitful place was a wilderness, and all the cities thereof were broken down at the presence of the Lord, and by his fierce anger.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:27
verses.text: For thus hath the Lord said, The whole land shall be desolate; yet will I not make a full end.
